snippet.title: Sniper Killer - Official Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2023
snippet.description: Eliminate your victims as a serial killer dubbed ‘The Sniper Killer’. Terrorize the city with your keen eye and thirst for blood while staying one step ahead of a detective hell-bent on bringing you to justice. Check out the trailer. Sniper Killer will be available on PC and a demo is available now on Steam.
